BlackFang:

"I'm BLackFang"said the male"and this is prehistoric Earth, and 
we're expecting that Unicron attack this planet soon altough It 
wseems that he was leaving us 'cause we haven't seen him or his 
minions around but... I have a bad feeling about this"
